title: Creating Semi-Serious Team (Plat+)
body:
My friend and I will be forming a team that will play in tournaments as often as possible and may or may not practice depending on the players and their schedules/situations. We are aiming to win RP, get better and most importantly have fun all while playing to win. Fill out app and add me in game. Tryouts will most like be throughout the rest of the day.

The Following Positions are Open:
-Mid
-ADC
-Jungle

IGN:
Role:
Champs pool:
Skype?(y/n):
Rank:
Timezone:
Anything you would like me to know(optional):

replies.body:
IGN: Kepogata
Role: ADC
Champs pool: {{champion:15}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:222}} 
Skype?(y/n): Yes
Rank: Plat4
Timezone: EST
Anything you would like me to know(optional): Looking for a fun team, semi-serious and just overall a good time.

IGN: ImTryingToLearn
Role: Mid
Champs pool: {{champion:103}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:96}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:112}} {{champion:8}} {{champion:101}} 
Skype?(y/n): Yes
Rank: Plat 5 (in promos to Plat 4)
Timezone: Central
Anything you would like me to know(optional): I've played in multiple tournaments so I have experience in that aspect.

IGN: Which account? Just add this one ;) Juqt
Role: I go mid, I go adc
Champs pool: Uh, Like every champion in the game... Duh.
Skype?(y/n): yeeee
Rank: my elo varies from what account im playing on. this just my smurf p5 70lp
Timezone: Central
Anything you would like me to know(optional): I tend to do worse if people talk a lot for no reason. I'll ping the wards, time the flashes in chat.
